mapper.select: select count(*) from t_coupon c where exists (select 1 from t_event e where c.coupon_code = e.coupon_code)
select count(*) from t_coupon c where exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where c.coupon_code = p.coupon_code)
select count(*) from t_coupon c where not exists (select 1 from t_event e where c.coupon_code = e.coupon_code) and not exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where c.coupon_code = p.coupon_code)
select coupon_code as code, coupon_type as type, coupon_name as name, event_code as eventCode from t_coupon where event_code is null

select coupon_code code, coupon_type type, coupon_name name, event_code eventCode from( select row_number() over (order by coupon_code desc) rn, coupon_code , coupon_type,coupon_name, event_code from t_coupon order by coupon_code desc )
where rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} order by coupon_code desc

select v.coupon_code code, v.coupon_type type, v.coupon_name name, v.event_code eventCode, v.event_title eventTitle from( select row_number() over (order by c.coupon_code desc) rn, c.coupon_code , c.coupon_type, c.coupon_name, e.event_code, e.event_title from t_coupon c, t_event e where e.coupon_code = c.coupon_code order by c.coupon_code desc ) v where rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} and exists (select 1 from t_event e where v.coupon_code = e.coupon_code) order by coupon_code desc

select v.coupon_code code, v.coupon_type type, v.coupon_name name, v.event_code eventCode from( select row_number() over (order by c.coupon_code desc) rn, c.coupon_code , c.coupon_type, c.coupon_name, e.event_code from t_coupon c, t_event e order by c.coupon_code desc ) v where rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} and exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where v.coupon_code = p.coupon_code) order by coupon_code desc

select v.coupon_code code, v.coupon_type type, v.coupon_name name, v.event_code eventCode from( select row_number() over (order by coupon_code desc) rn, c.coupon_code , c.coupon_type, c.coupon_name, c.event_code from t_coupon c order by c.coupon_code desc ) v where rn between #{beginIndex} and #{endIndex} and not exists (select 1 from t_event e where v.coupon_code = e.coupon_code) and not exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where v.coupon_code = p.coupon_code) order by coupon_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_coupon (coupon_code, coupon_type, coupon_name) values ('CP' || lpad(T_COUPON_SEQ.nextval, 6,0), #{type}, #{name})
mapper.select: select * from t_coupon where event_code is null
mapper.delete: delete from t_coupon c where not exists (select 1 from t_event e where c.coupon_code = e.coupon_code) and not exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where c.coupon_code = p.coupon_code) and c.coupon_code = #{value}
mapper.select: select c.coupon_code from t_coupon c where exists (select 1 from t_event e where c.coupon_code = e.coupon_code) and c.coupon_code = #{value}
select c.coupon_code from t_coupon c where exists (select 1 from t_published_coupon p where c.coupon_code = p.coupon_code) and c.coupon_code = #{value}

select pc.published_code as publishedCode, cp.coupon_code as couponCode, pc.user_id as userId, pc.published_given_date as givenDate, pc.published_end_date as endDate, cp.coupon_type as type, cp.coupon_name as couponName from t_published_coupon pc, t_coupon cp where pc.coupon_code = cp.coupon_code and SYSDATE + round(540/1440, 5) between pc.published_given_date and pc.published_end_date and pc.published_used = 'N' and user_id = #{value}

select pc.published_code as publishedCode, cp.coupon_code as couponCode, pc.user_id as userId, pc.published_given_date as givenDate, pc.published_end_date as endDate, cp.coupon_type as type, cp.coupon_name as couponName from t_published_coupon pc, t_coupon cp where pc.coupon_code = cp.coupon_code and pc.published_code = #{value}
select event_code from t_coupon where coupon_code = #{value}
